Judy HARPER, Estate of Terry D. Harper, II, ex rel. Judy Harper, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
Bruce HARLEY, M.D., Appellee-Defendant. Court of Appeals Case No. 71A03-1611-CT-2523 Court of Appeals of Indiana. September 8, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

MATHIAS , J.

Affirmed.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.

KIRSCH, J., Dissents with opinion.
